entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as a character who sweeps over to Harry with a dustpan and brush. She asks for one of the blue ones, indicating that she is collecting something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who has teacups filled by Professor Trelawney. He tries to drink the scalding tea quickly with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as Harry's friend, who has teacups filled by Professor Trelawney and tries to drink the scalding tea quickly with Harry.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney asks Harry for one of the blue ones, indicating that she is requesting something from him.
Professor Trelawney also asks Ron for one of the blue ones, indicating that she is requesting something from him as well.
Harry receives instruction from Professor Trelawney to broaden his mind and see past the mundane, indicating that he is receiving guidance or advice from her.
Ron also receives instruction from Professor Trelawney to broaden his mind and see past the mundane, indicating that he is receiving guidance or advice from her as well.
